cards.rules_text: Create three Food tokens. Then choose up to X noncreature artifacts you control. Those artifacts become 2/2 blue Crab Minion creatures in addition to their other types.

[i](This creature is all colors.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose three. You may choose the same option multiple times.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control gain vigilance, trample, or haste until end of turn.
